segments.text: What do you think of shopping ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't mind shopping for food and other daily needs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think of big department store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's fun walking around them , but their displays are so good I'm tempted to buy things I don't really need .
segments.speaker: S2
